Rulings.Edison:
●You can use “Fusion Recovery” to retrieve a Fusion Material Monster that was used with “Power Bond” or “Fusion Gate” or “Polymerization”.
●You can use “Fusion Recovery” to retrieve a fusion substitute monster like “King of the Swamp” or “Goddess with the Third Eye” as long as it was used in a Fusion Summon.
●“Fusion Recovery” targets 1 monster and 1 “Polymerization” in the GY (so it will be negated by “Necrovalley” or “The End of Anubis”).
●If 1 of the targeted cards is no longer in the GY when this effect resolve, you still resolve the rest of the effect as best you can.

Rulings.Base:
1. You can use "Fusion Recovery" to retrieve a Fusion Material Monster that was used with "Power Bond" or "Fusion Gate" or "Polymerization".
2. You can use "Fusion Recovery" to retrieve a fusion substitute monster like "King of the Swamp" or "Goddess with the Third Eye" as long as it was used in a Fusion Summon.
3. "Fusion Recovery" targets 1 monster and 1 "Polymerization" in the GY (so it will be negated by "Necrovalley" or "The End of Anubis").
4. If 1 of the targeted cards is no longer in the GY when this effect resolve, you still resolve the rest of the effect as best you can.
